articles.title: Update: Cash App founder, MobileCoin CPO Bob Lee stabbed to death in San Francisco's Rincon Hill neighborhood - CBS San Francisco
articles.description: Bob Lee, founder of Cash App and the former chief technology officer of Square, was identified as the man stabbed to death Tuesday near downtown San Francisco, according to his current employer, cryptocurrency startup MobileCoin.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- Bob Lee, founder of Cash App and the former chief technology officer of Square, was identified as the man stabbed to death early Tuesday morning near downtown San Francisco, accordin… [+3736 chars]

articles.title: All you need to know about ‘Apple BKC’, India's first Apple store in Mumbai - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On Wednesday, the tech giant shared a ‘teaser’ of the retail outlet, which is inside the Jio World Drive Mall at Bandra Kurla Complex.
articles.content: Apple on Wednesday shared a glimpse of its first-ever retail store for India, thus confirming long-standing reports of the tech giant being in talks to open its maiden outlet in the country. Called B… [+1242 chars]
